tp:treatment-sec.p: Natural history
Distribution

The species of
Evippa
are distributed in arid and semiarid environments across Eurasia and Africa. Eight species are reported from Africa, four species are reported from Europe, and 34 are reported from Asia (13 from Central Asia, nine from India , nine from the Middle East, seven from China and one from Siberia) ( World Spider Catalog 2020 ). In Israel four species are found.
Relationships

The genus appears to be closely related to
Pseudevippa Simon, 1910
, from which it is distinguished by the number of ventral spines on tibia I ( Alderweireldt 1991 ).
